price: Hii ndiyo Siku ya Hukumu mliyo kuwa mkiikadhibisha.
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
footnotes: Watajibiwa: Hii ndiyo Siku ya Hukumu na kufarikisha vitendo, mliyo kuwa mkiikadhibisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
